code: import i18n from"i18next";import{initReactI18next}from"react-i18next";import LanguageDetector from"i18next-browser-languagedetector";import Backend from"i18next-http-backend";i18n.use(Backend).use(LanguageDetector).use(initReactI18next).init({fallbackLng:"en",debug:true,detection:{order:["queryString","cookie"],cache:["cookie"]},interpolation:{escapeValue:false}});export default i18n;
